main event: A highly reflecting object was observed in Enid, Oklahoma on 7 July 1952, moving erratically and disappearing at various intervals.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately two and a half hours, It reflected sunlight intensely and appeared metallic, Attempts to photograph the object were unsuccessful, Several residents, including children, witnessed the sighting, The object disappeared around 4:00 p.m., with no known explanation for its appearance.
witness description: Inhabitants of Enid and surrounding areas
